ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
####################################################################### # SCRIPT TO EXECUTE orainstRoot.sh, root.sh OF GRID INFRASTRUCTURE #######################################################################
#PARAMTERS FROM APP DIRECTOR GRID_ORACLE_BASE="$grid_oracle_base" NFSPATH="$nfspath" GRID_HOME="$grid_home" GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION="$grid_inventory_location" GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION="$grid_installer_extract_location" ORACLE_HOME="$oracle_home" ORACLE_BASE="$oracle_base"
#FUNCTION TO DISPLAY ERROR AND EXIT function check_error() { if [ ! "$?" = "0" ]; then error_exit "$1"; fi }
function error_exit() { echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2 exit 1 }
echo "Paramter Validation" if [ "x${GRID_ORACLE_BASE}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_ORACLE_BASE not set." fi
if [ "x${GRID_HOME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_HOME not set." fi
if [ "x${GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION not set." fi
if [ "x${GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION not set." fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_HOME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_HOME not set." fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_BASE}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_BASE not set." fi
mkdir -p $ORACLE_HOME
#AFTER INSTALLATION OF GRID, NEED TO EXECUTE TWO FILES (orainstRoot.sh, root.sh) AS ROOT USER echo "executing orainstRoot.sh" $GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION/orainstRoot.sh $GRID_HOME/root.sh
LOOP_ITERATION=120 for (( i = 0 ; i < $LOOP_ITERATION ; i++ )) do grep -q "Configure Oracle Grid Infrastructure for a Cluster ... succeeded" $GRID_HOME/install/*.log if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo "ROOT.SH EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY" break else if [ $i -eq 119 ]; then echo "ROOT.SH EXECUTION FAILED" break fi sleep 30 fi done
chown -R $oracle_user:oinstall $ORACLE_BASE

ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
############################################### # SCRIPT TO EXTRACT THE GRID INSTALLER FILE ###############################################
#Environmental Variables #export http_proxy=http://proxy.vmware.com:3128 export PATH=/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/games:/opt/vmware/bin:/opt/vmware/bin export HOME=/root export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin/:/usr/sbin/:/sbin
#MAKE SWAPFILE FOR INSTALLER #ORACLE INSTALLER WILL TEST FOR A SWAP SIZE OF 150M, THIS GARUNTEES WE HAVE IT dd if=/dev/zero of=/tmp/swapfile bs=1024 count=150000 mkswap /tmp/swapfile swapon /tmp/swapfile
#PARAMTERS FROM APP DIRECTOR GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION="$grid_inventory_location" GRID_HOME="$grid_home" GRID_ORACLE_BASE="$grid_oracle_base" ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION="$orcale_installer_location" GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION="$grid_installer_extract_location" ORACLE_USER="$oracle_user" host=`hostname` NFS_PATH="$nfs_path" MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION="$mount_point_location"
#FUNCTION TO DISPLAY ERROR AND EXIT function check_error() { if [ ! "$?" = "0" ]; then error_exit "$1"; fi }
function error_exit() { echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2 exit 1 }
echo "Paramter Validation"
if [ "x${GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION not set." fi
if [ "x${GRID_HOME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_HOME not set." fi
if [ "x${GRID_ORACLE_BASE}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_ORACLE_BASE not set." fi
if [ "x${ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION not set." fi
if [ "x${GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION not set." fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_USER}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_USER not set." fi
if [ "x${NFS_PATH}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "NFS_PATH not set." fi
if [ "x${GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION not set." fi
if [ "x${ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION not set." fi
#BASIC DIRECTORY STRUCTURE mkdir -p $GRID_ORACLE_BASE mkdir -p $GRID_HOME mkdir -p $GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION mkdir -p $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION mkdir -p $MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION chown -R $oracle_user:oinstall $GRID_ORACLE_BASE chown -R $oracle_user:oinstall $GRID_HOME chown -R $oracle_user:oinstall $GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION chown -R $oracle_user:oinstall $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION chown -R $oracle_user:oinstall $MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION chmod -R 777 $GRID_ORACLE_BASE chmod -R 777 $GRID_HOME chmod -R 777 $GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION chmod -R 777 $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION chmod -R 777 $MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION check_error "ERRORS DURING CREATING BASIC DIRECOTRY STRUCTURE.";
#CHANGING OWENERSIP OF GRID HOME chown -R $ORACLE_USER $GRID_HOME
#COMMAND TO REMOVE EXISTING PACKAGE rm -rf $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION/*
#CREATING MOUNT POINT LOCATION mkdir -p $MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION
#MOUNTING THE NFS PATH mount $NFS_PATH $MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION check_error "ERRORS DURING MOUNTING ORACLE INSTALLER.";
#nohup cp $MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION/p10404530_112030_Linux-x86-64_3of7.zip $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION nohup cp $MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION/* $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION check_error "FAILED TO COPY ORACLE INSTALLER.";
cd $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION
#UNZIPPING GRID INSTALLER #unzip -q $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION/p10404530_112030_Linux-x86-64_3of7.zip -d $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION #unzip -q $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION/* -d $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION unzip -q \*.zip -d $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION check_error "FAILED TO EXTRACT ORACLE INSTALLER.";
#CHANGING THE OWNERSHIP OF EXTRACT LOCATION chown -R $oracle_user $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION

#!/bin/bash
######################################################################################## # SCRIPT TO INSTALL cvuqdisk RPM AND CHANGING OWNERSHIP OF GRID RELATED FOLDERS ########################################################################################
#ENVIRONMENTAL VARIABLES #export http_proxy=http://proxy.vmware.com:3128 export PATH=/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/games:/opt/vmware/bin:/opt/vmware/bin export HOME=/root export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin/:/usr/sbin/:/sbin
#PARAMTERS FROM APP DIRECTOR GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION="$grid_installer_extract_location" ORACLE_INVENTORY_LOCATION="$oracle_inventory_location" ORACLE_USER="$oracle_user"
ORACLE_HOSTNAME=`hostname`.`dnsdomainname` HOST=`hostname`
## Function To Display Error and Exit function check_error() { if [ ! "$?" = "0" ]; then error_exit "$1"; fi }
function error_exit() { echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2 exit 1 }
echo "Paramter Validation"
if [ "x${GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION not set." fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_INVENTORY_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_INVENTORY_LOCATION not set." fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_USER}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_USER not set." fi
#CREATING INVENTORY LOCATION mkdir -p $ORACLE_INVENTORY_LOCATION
#CHANGING THE OWENERSHIP OF INVENTORY LOCATION chown -R $ORACLE_USER:oinstall $ORACLE_INVENTORY_LOCATION
#INSTALLING cvuqdisk-1.0.9-1.rpm rpm -ivh $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION/grid/rpm/cvuqdisk-1.0.9-1.rpm
#CHANGING PERMISSION ON /etc/ #chown -R $ORACLE_USER /etc/

ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
######################################################### # SCRIPT TO INSTALL THE PRE-REQUISITE PACKAGES FOR RAC # ADDING VIPs AND IPs OF REMOTE HOSTS IN /etc/hosts # SETTING UP NFS #########################################################
#ENVIRONMENTAL VARIABLES #IMPORT GLOBAL CONFIG . $global_conf #export http_proxy=http://proxy.vmware.com:3128 export PATH=/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/games:/opt/vmware/bin:/opt/vmware/bin export HOME=/root export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin/:/usr/sbin/:/sbin
#PARAMTERS FROM APP DIRECTOR GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION="$grid_inventory_location" GRID_HOME="$grid_home" GRID_ORACLE_BASE="$grid_oracle_base"
#FUNCTION TO DISPLAY ERROR AND EXIT function check_error() { if [ ! "$?" = "0" ]; then error_exit "$1"; fi }
function error_exit() { echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2 exit 1 }
function valid_ip() { local ip=$1 local stat=1 if [[ $ip =~ ^[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}$ ]]; then OIFS=$IFS IFS='.' ip=($ip) IFS=$OIFS [[ ${ip[0]} -le 255 && ${ip[1]} -le 255\ && ${ip[2]} -le 255 && ${ip[3]} -le 255 ]] stat=$? fi return $stat }
echo "Paramter Validation"
if [ "x${GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION not set." fi
if [ "x${GRID_HOME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_HOME not set." fi
if [ "x${GRID_ORACLE_BASE}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_ORACLE_BASE not set." fi
if valid_ip $rac_scan_ip; then stat='good' else echo "BAD IP FORMAT USED FOR SCAN" exit fi
count=${#rac_vip_ip[@]} index=0 while [ "$index" -lt "$count" ]; do ip="${rac_vip_ip[$index]}" if valid_ip $ip; then stat="good" else echo "BAD IP FORMAT USED FOR VIP" exit fi let "index++" done
# TO SET IPTABLES OFF /etc/init.d/iptables save /etc/init.d/iptables stop
#ORACLE INSTALLER WILL TEST FOR A SWAP SIZE OF 150M, THIS GARUNTEES WE HAVE IT dd if=/dev/zero of=/tmp/swapfile bs=1024 count=150000 mkswap /tmp/swapfile swapon /tmp/swapfile
#SETUP USERS ANDS GROUPS echo "Adding Oracle User" /usr/sbin/groupadd oinstall /usr/sbin/groupadd dba /usr/sbin/useradd -m -d /home/$oracle_user -g oinstall -p $oracle_user -G dba $oracle_user chown -R oracle /home/$oracle_user
check_error "Errors during setting up user accounts."; echo "ADDING ORACLE USER -- DONE"
#ADDING ORACLE REPOSITORY #sed -i '3cbaseurl='$yum_repo_url'' /etc/yum.repos.d/rhel-source.repo
#INSTALLING REQUIRED PACKAGES yum --nogpgcheck --noplugins -y install binutils smartmontools expect kernel oracleasm-support compat-libstdc++-33 libcap compat-libcap1 compat-libstdc++ elfutils-libelf elfutils-libelf-devel gcc gcc-c++ glibc glibc glibc-common glibc-devel glibc-devel libaio libaio-devel libgcc libgcc libstdc++ lbXtst libstdc++ libstdc++-devel make numactl-devel sysstat nfs-utils pdksh unixODBC unixODBC-devel unzip control-center check_error "UNABLE TO INSTALL THE REQUIRED PACKAGES.";
sed -i '2i'$main_host_ip' '$main_hostname'.'`dnsdomainname`' '$main_hostname'' /etc/hosts DNS_NAME=`dnsdomainname`
#SETTING SCAN IP AND NAME IN /etc/hosts/ FILE sed -i '2i'$rac_scan_ip' raccluster-scan.'$DNS_NAME' raccluster-scan' /etc/hosts
#SETTING RAC VIP IP AND ITS NAME IN /etc/hosts/ FILE COUNT=${#rac_vip_ip[@]} INDEX=0 while [ "$INDEX" -lt "$COUNT" ]; do IP="${rac_vip_ip[$INDEX]}" raccount=`expr $INDEX + 1` sed -i '2i'$IP' racvip'$raccount'.'$DNS_NAME' racvip'$raccount'' /etc/hosts let "INDEX++" done
#ADDING REMOTE HOST IP AND HOST NAME IN etc/hosts FILE COUNT=${#count[@]} HOST=`hostname` INDEX=0 int_ip=192.0.0.10 while [ "$INDEX" -lt "$COUNT" ]; do HOST_NAME="${remote_host_name[$INDEX]}" IP="${remote_host_ip[$INDEX]}" if [ "$INDEX" -lt "$COUNT" ]; then sed -i '2i'192.0.0.9' racpr0.'`dnsdomainname`' racpr0' /etc/hosts fi end_ip=`echo ${int_ip:8}` start_ip=`echo ${int_ip:0:8}` end_ip=`expr $end_ip + 1` racpr_ip=$start_ip$end_ip raccount=`expr $INDEX + 1` if [ "$end_ip" = "99" ]; then echo "TOO MANY NODES, EXITING PROGRAM" exit fi sed -i '2i'$racpr_ip' racpr'$raccount'.'`dnsdomainname`' racpr'$raccount'' /etc/hosts int_ip=$racpr_ip sed -i '2i'$IP' '$HOST_NAME'.'`dnsdomainname`' '$HOST_NAME'' /etc/hosts
if [ "$HOST" = "${remote_host_name[$INDEX]}" ]; then /sbin/ifconfig eth0:1 $racpr_ip netmask 255.255.255.0 broadcast 192.0.0.255 fi let "INDEX++" done
# MAKING CHAMGES TO THE SSHD_CONFIG FILE echo "RSAAuthentication yes" >> /etc/ssh/sshd_config echo "PubkeyAuthentication yes" >> /etc/ssh/sshd_config
#ADDING PASSWORD TO ORACLE USER cat <<EOF > passwd.exp #!/usr/bin/expect spawn passwd $oracle_user expect "*password:" send "$oracle_user_password\r" expect "*password:" send "$oracle_user_password\r" expect eof EOF
chmod 777 passwd.exp ./passwd.exp check_error "UNABLE TO SET PASSWORD FOR THE ORACLE USER.";
#RESTARTING SSH SERVICE /etc/init.d/sshd restart service sshd start chkconfig sshd on
mkdir $storage_location $shared_storage_location check_error "FAILED TO CREATE STORAGE LOCATION.";
#CHANGING OWNER ON FOLDERS STORAGE LOCATION AND SHARED STORAGE LOCATION chown -R $ORACLE_USER $storage_location $shared_storage_location
#ENABLING NFS CONFIGURATION chkconfig nfs on
#ADDING ENTRY OF THE SHARED LOCATION IN /etc/exports echo "$shared_storage_location *(rw,sync,no_wdelay,insecure_locks,no_root_squash)" >> /etc/exports
#ADDING ENTRY OF THE SHARED LOCATION IN /etc/fstab WITH DETAILS echo "$main_host_ip:$shared_storage_location $storage_location nfs rw,bg,hard,nointr,tcp,vers=3,timeo=600,rsize=32768,wsize=32768,actimeo=0 0 0" >> /etc/fstab
##MOUNTING NFS DRIVE #STARTING rpcbind /sbin/service rpcbind start
#RESTART NFS SERVICE service nfs restart
#MOUNTING mount $storage_location check_error "FAILED TO MOUNT STORAGE LOCATION";
#BASIC DIRECTORY STRUCTURE mkdir -p $GRID_ORACLE_BASE mkdir -p $GRID_HOME mkdir -p $GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION check_error "FAILED TO CREATE REQUIRED FOLDER.";
chown -R $oracle_user:oinstall $GRID_ORACLE_BASE chown -R $oracle_user:oinstall $GRID_HOME chown -R $oracle_user:oinstall $GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION chmod -R 775 $GRID_ORACLE_BASE chmod -R 775 $GRID_HOME chmod -R 775 $GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION

ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
########################################### # SCRIPT TO EDIT GRID RESPONSE FILE # EDIT DB RESPONSE FILE # INSTALLING cvuqdisk RPM ###########################################
#ENVIRONMENTAL VARIABLES #export http_proxy=http://proxy.vmware.com:3128 export PATH=/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/games:/opt/vmware/bin:/opt/vmware/bin export HOME=/root export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin/:/usr/sbin/:/sbin
#APPDIRECTOR VARIABLES ORACLE_INVENTORY_LOCATION="$oracle_inventory_location" ORACLE_HOME="$oracle_home" ORACLE_BASE="$oracle_base" ORACLE_INSTALL_EDITION="$oracle_install_edition" REMOTE_IP="$remote_ip" MEMORY_LIMIT="$memory_limit" STORAGE_LOCATION="$storage_location" EMAIL="$email_id" ORACLE_SUPPORT_PASSWORD="$oracle_support_password" REMOTE_HOSTNAME="$remote_hostname" GLOBAL_DB_NAME="$global_db_name" ORACLE_USER_PASSWORD="$oracle_user_password" GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION="$grid_installer_extract_location" DB_TYPE="$db_type" INSTALL_EDITION="$oracle_install_edition" GRID_ORACLE_BASE="$grid_oracle_base" ORACLE_HOSTNAME=`hostname`.`dnsdomainname` GRID_HOME="$grid_home" GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION="$grid_inventory_location" CLUSTER_OPTION="$cluster_option" DBA_GROUP=dba OPER_GROUP=dba OSASM_GROUP=oinstall SCAN_NAME="$scan_name" SCAN_PORT="$scan_port" CLUSTER_NAME="$cluster_name" STORAGE_OPTION=FILE_SYSTEM_STORAGE STORAGE_LOCATION="$storage_location" ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION="$orcale_installer_location" GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION="$grid_installer_extract_location" NFS_PATH="$nfs_path" DB_TYPE="$db_type" MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION="$mount_point_location"
#GETTING COMPLETE HOST NAME ORACLE_HOSTNAME=`hostname`.`dnsdomainname`
#LOGIC TO SET THE NETWORK VARIABLE int_ip=`/sbin/ifconfig eth0 | grep 'inet addr:' | cut -d: -f2 | awk '{ print $1}'` end_ip=0 ip_count=12 while [ "$end_ip" != "." ] do end_ip=`echo ${int_ip:ip_count}` start_ip=`echo ${int_ip:0:ip_count}` ip_count=`expr $ip_count - 1` int_ip=$start_ip done echo $start_ip.0
#SETTING NERWORK VARIABLE NETWORK="eth0:$start_ip.0:1,eth0:192.0.0.0:2"
HOST=`hostname`
#FUNCTION TO DISPLAY ERROR AND EXIT function check_error() { if [ ! "$?" = "0" ]; then error_exit "$1"; fi }
function error_exit() { echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2 exit 1 }
echo "Paramter Validation"
if [ "x${ORACLE_INVENTORY_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_INVENTORY_LOCATION not set." fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_HOME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_HOME not set." fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_BASE}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_BASE not set." fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_INSTALL_EDITION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_INSTALL_EDITION not set." fi
if [ "x${REMOTE_IP}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "REMOTE_IP not set." fi
if [ "x${MEMORY_LIMIT}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "MEMORY_LIMIT not set." fi
if [ "x${EMAIL}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "EMAIL not set." fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_SUPPORT_PASSWORD}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_SUPPORT_PASSWORD not set." fi
if [ "x${REMOTE_HOSTNAME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "REMOTE_HOSTNAME not set." fi
if [ "x${GLOBAL_DB_NAME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GLOBAL_DB_NAME not set." fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_USER_PASSWORD}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_USER_PASSWORD not set." fi
if [ "x${GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION not set." fi
#BLOCK TO GET THE CLUSTER NODE'S HOSTNAME AND RAC VIP count=${#remote_hostname[@]} index=0 dns=`dnsdomainname` while [ "$index" -lt "$count" ]; do rm_host="${remote_hostname[$index]}" let "index++" raccount=`expr $index + 1` c="$rm_host:racvip$raccount.$dns" touch clu.txt chmod 777 clu.txt if [ "$index" = "1" ]; then echo $c >> clu.txt else sed -e 's/$/'$c'/' -i clu.txt fi if [ "$index" != "$count" ]; then sed -e 's/$/,/' -i clu.txt fi done
CLUSTER_NODE=`hostname`:racvip1.`dnsdomainname`,`cat clu.txt` rm -rf clu.txt
#GRID FILE COMPLETE LOCATION GRIDFILE=$GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION/grid/response/grid_install.rsp
#CHANING THE PARAMETER IN grid.rsp sed -i "s~ORACLE_HOSTNAME=*~ORACLE_HOSTNAME=$ORACLE_HOSTNAME~g" $GRIDFILE sed -i "s~INVENTORY_LOCATION=*~INVENTORY_LOCATION=$GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION~g" $GRIDFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.option==*~oracle.install.option=$CLUSTER_OPTION~g" $GRIDFILE sed -i "s~ORACLE_BASE=*~ORACLE_BASE=$GRID_ORACLE_BASE~g" $GRIDFILE sed -i "s~ORACLE_HOME=*~ORACLE_HOME=$GRID_HOME~g" $GRIDFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.asm.OSDBA=*~oracle.install.asm.OSDBA=$DBA_GROUP~g" $GRIDFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.asm.OSOPER=*~oracle.install.asm.OSOPER=$OPER_GROUP~g" $GRIDFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.asm.OSASM=*~oracle.install.asm.OSASM=$OSASM_GROUP~g" $GRIDFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.crs.config.gpnp.scanName=*~oracle.install.crs.config.gpnp.scanName=$SCAN_NAME~g" $GRIDFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.crs.config.gpnp.scanPort=*~oracle.install.crs.config.gpnp.scanPort=$SCAN_PORT~g" $GRIDFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.crs.config.clusterName=*~oracle.install.crs.config.clusterName=$CLUSTER_NAME~g" $GRIDFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.crs.config.clusterNodes=*~oracle.install.crs.config.clusterNodes=$CLUSTER_NODE~g" $GRIDFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.crs.config.sharedFileSystemStorage.votingDiskLocations=*~oracle.install.crs.config.sharedFileSystemStorage.votingDiskLocations=$STORAGE_LOCATION/vdisk1~g" $GRIDFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.crs.config.sharedFileSystemStorage.votingDiskRedundancy=NORMAL~oracle.install.crs.config.sharedFileSystemStorage.votingDiskRedundancy=EXTERNAL~g" $GRIDFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.crs.config.sharedFileSystemStorage.ocrLocations=*~oracle.install.crs.config.sharedFileSystemStorage.ocrLocations=$STORAGE_LOCATION/ocr1,~g" $GRIDFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.crs.config.sharedFileSystemStorage.ocrRedundancy=NORMAL~oracle.install.crs.config.sharedFileSystemStorage.ocrRedundancy=EXTERNAL~g" $GRIDFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.crs.config.networkInterfaceList=*~oracle.install.crs.config.networkInterfaceList=$NETWORK~g" $GRIDFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.crs.config.storageOption=*~oracle.install.crs.config.storageOption=$STORAGE_OPTION~g" $GRIDFILE
#INSTALLING cvuqdisk-1.0.9-1.rpm rpm -ivh $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION/grid/rpm/cvuqdisk-1.0.9-1.rpm
echo "MODIFYING DBCA RESPONSE FILE" #SETTING PATH OF DB RESPONSE FILE DBFILE=$GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION/database/response/db_install.rsp
#LOGIC TO CREATE VARIABLE HAVING VALUE OF CLUSTER'S NODES HOSTNAME HOST=`hostname` HOST1=`echo $HOST | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]'` count=${#remote_hostname[@]} index=0 while [ "$index" -lt "$count" ]; do r_host="${remote_hostname[$index]}" HOST2=`echo $r_host | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]'` HOST2=$r_host let "index++" raccount=`expr $index + 1` c=$HOST2 touch clu.txt chmod 777 clu.txt if [ "$index" = "1" ]; then echo $c >> clu.txt else sed -e 's/$/'$c'/' -i clu.txt fi if [ "$index" != "$count" ]; then sed -e 's/$/,/' -i clu.txt fi done
#VARIABLE HAVING ALL THE HOSTNAME OF THE NODES CLUSTER=$HOST1,`cat clu.txt`
#MODIFYING RESPONSE FILE sed -i "s~ORACLE_HOSTNAME=*~ORACLE_HOSTNAME=$ORACLE_HOSTNAME~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.option=*~oracle.install.option=INSTALL_DB_SWONLY~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~UNIX_GROUP_NAME=*~UNIX_GROUP_NAME=oinstall~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~INVENTORY_LOCATION=*~INVENTORY_LOCATION=$ORACLE_INVENTORY_LOCATION~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~ORACLE_HOME=*~ORACLE_HOME=$ORACLE_HOME~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~ORACLE_BASE=*~ORACLE_BASE=$ORACLE_BASE~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.InstallEdition=*~oracle.install.db.InstallEdition=$ORACLE_INSTALL_EDITION~g" $DBFILE if [ "$DB_TYPE" = "active-passive" ]; then sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.isRACOneInstall=*~oracle.install.db.isRACOneInstall=true~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.racOneServiceName=*~oracle.install.db.racOneServiceName=raconeservice~g" $DBFILE fi sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.DBA_GROUP=*~oracle.install.db.DBA_GROUP=dba~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.OPER_GROUP=*~oracle.install.db.OPER_GROUP=dba~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.CLUSTER_NODES=*~oracle.install.db.CLUSTER_NODES=$CLUSTER~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.type=*~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.type=GENERAL_PURPOSE~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.globalDBName=*~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.globalDBName=$GLOBAL_DB_NAME~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.SID=*~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.SID=$GLOBAL_DB_NAME~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.memoryLimit=*~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.memoryLimit=$MEMORY_LIMIT~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.installExampleSchemas=false~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.installExampleSchemas=true~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.enableSecuritySettings=true~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.enableSecuritySettings=false~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~DECLINE_SECURITY_UPDATES=*~DECLINE_SECURITY_UPDATES=true~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.password.ALL=*~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.password.ALL=$ORACLE_USER_PASSWORD~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.password.SYS=*~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.password.SYS=$ORACLE_USER_PASSWORD~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.password.SYSTEM=*~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.password.SYSTEM=$ORACLE_USER_PASSWORD~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.password.SYSMAN=*~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.password.SYSMAN=$ORACLE_USER_PASSWORD~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.password.DBSNMP=*~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.password.DBSNMP=$ORACLE_USER_PASSWORD~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.storageType=*~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.storageType=FILE_SYSTEM_STORAGE~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.fileSystemStorage.dataLocation=*~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.fileSystemStorage.dataLocation=$storage_location/dbData~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.fileSystemStorage.recoveryLocation=*~oracle.install.db.config.starterdb.fileSystemStorage.recoveryLocation=$storage_location/dbRecoverLoc~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~MYORACLESUPPORT_USERNAME=*~MYORACLESUPPORT_USERNAME=$EMAIL~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~MYORACLESUPPORT_PASSWORD=*~MYORACLESUPPORT_PASSWORD=$ORACLE_SUPPORT_PASSWORD~g" $DBFILE sed -i "s~oracle.installer.autoupdates.option=*~oracle.installer.autoupdates.option=SKIP_UPDATES~g" $DBFILE echo "MODIFICATION DONE IN RESPONSE FILE for DBINSTALL"
#CHANGING OWNER IN FOLDERS /disk2/ /etc/ #chown -R $oracle_user /etc/

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
#################################################### # SCRIPT FOR SSH SETUP ACROSS THE NODES # EXTRACTING ALL ORACLE RAC ZIP INSTALLER FILE ####################################################
#ENVIRONMENTAL VARIABLES #export http_proxy=http://proxy.vmware.com:3128 export PATH=/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/games:/opt/vmware/bin:/opt/vmware/bin export HOME=/root export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin/:/usr/sbin/:/sbin
#PARAMTERS FROM APP DIRECTOR INSTALL_EDITION="$oracle_install_edition" GRID_ORACLE_BASE="$grid_oracle_base" ORACLE_HOSTNAME=`hostname`.`dnsdomainname` GRID_HOME="$grid_home" GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION="$grid_inventory_location" CLUSTER_OPTION="$cluster_option" DBA_GROUP=dba OPER_GROUP=dba OSASM_GROUP=oinstall SCAN_NAME="$scan_name" SCAN_PORT="$scan_port" CLUSTER_NAME="$cluster_name" STORAGE_OPTION=FILE_SYSTEM_STORAGE STORAGE_LOCATION="$storage_location" ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION="$orcale_installer_location" GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION="$grid_installer_extract_location" NFS_PATH="$nfs_path" DB_TYPE="$db_type" MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION="$mount_point_location"
#GETTING COMPLETE HOST NAME ORACLE_HOSTNAME=`hostname`.`dnsdomainname` host=`hostname` NETWORK="eth0:10.140.17.0:1,eth0:192.0.0.0:2"
#FUNCTION TO DISPLAY ERROR AND EXIT function check_error() { if [ ! "$?" = "0" ]; then error_exit "$1"; fi }
function error_exit() { echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2 exit 1 }
echo "Paramter Validation"
if [ "x${INSTALL_EDITION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "INSTALL_EDITION not set." fi
if [ "x${GRID_ORACLE_BASE}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_ORACLE_BASE not set." fi
if [ "x${GRID_HOME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_HOME not set." fi
if [ "x${GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION not set." fi
if [ "x${CLUSTER_OPTION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "CLUSTER_OPTION not set." fi
if [ "x${SCAN_NAME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "SCAN_NAME not set." fi
if [ "x${SCAN_PORT}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "SCAN_PORT not set." fi
if [ "x${CLUSTER_NAME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "CLUSTER_NAME not set." fi
if [ "x${STORAGE_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "STORAGE_LOCATION not set." fi
if [ "x${ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION not set." fi
if [ "x${GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION not set." fi
if [ "x${NFS_PATH}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "NFS_PATH not set." fi
if [ "$DB_TYPE" = "active-active" ] ; then echo "ACTIVE-ACTIVE MODE IS SELECTED" elif [ "$DB_TYPE" = "active-passive" ] ; then echo "ACTIVE-PASSIVE MODE IS SELECTED" else error_exit "DB_TYPE NOT SET PROPERLY, EXPECTED VALUES ARE active-passive OR active-active" fi
#MAKE SWAPFILE FOR INSTALLER #ORACLE INSTALLER WILL TEST FOR A SWAP SIZE OF 150M, THIS GARUNTEES WE HAVE IT dd if=/dev/zero of=/tmp/swapfile bs=1024 count=150000 mkswap /tmp/swapfile swapon /tmp/swapfile
#BASIC DIRECTORY STRUCTURE mkdir -p $GRID_ORACLE_BASE mkdir -p $GRID_HOME mkdir -p $GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION mkdir -p $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION mkdir -p $MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION chown -R $oracle_user:oinstall $GRID_ORACLE_BASE chown -R $oracle_user:oinstall $GRID_HOME chown -R $oracle_user:oinstall $GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION chown -R $oracle_user:oinstall $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION chown -R $oracle_user:oinstall $MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION chmod -R 777 $GRID_ORACLE_BASE chmod -R 777 $GRID_HOME chmod -R 777 $GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION chmod -R 777 $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION chmod -R 777 $MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION check_error "ERRORS DURING CREATING BASIC DIRECOTRY STRUCTURE.";
#COMMAND TO REMOVE EXISTING PACKAGE rm -rf $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION/*
#CREATING MOUNT POINT LOCATION mkdir -p $MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION
#MOUNTING THE NFS PATH mount $NFS_PATH $MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION check_error "ERRORS DURING MOUNTING ORACLE INSTALLER.";
nohup cp $MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION/* $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION #nohup cp $MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION/p10404530_112030_Linux-x86-64_1of7.zip $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION #nohup cp $MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION/p10404530_112030_Linux-x86-64_2of7.zip $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION #nohup cp $MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION/p10404530_112030_Linux-x86-64_3of7.zip $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION #nohup cp $MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION/p10404530_112030_Linux-x86-64_4of7.zip $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION #nohup cp $MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION/p10404530_112030_Linux-x86-64_5of7.zip $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION #nohup cp $MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION/p10404530_112030_Linux-x86-64_6of7.zip $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION #nohup cp $MOUNT_POINT_LOCATION/p10404530_112030_Linux-x86-64_7of7.zip $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION check_error "FAILED TO COPY ORACLE INSTALLER.";
cd $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION
#UNZIPPING GRID INSTALLER unzip -q \*.zip -d $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION #unzip -q $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION/* -d $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION #unzip -q $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION/p10404530_112030_Linux-x86-64_1of7.zip -d $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION #unzip -q $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION/p10404530_112030_Linux-x86-64_2of7.zip -d $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION #unzip -q $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION/p10404530_112030_Linux-x86-64_3of7.zip -d $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION #unzip -q $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION/p10404530_112030_Linux-x86-64_4of7.zip -d $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION #unzip -q $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION/p10404530_112030_Linux-x86-64_5of7.zip -d $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION #unzip -q $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION/p10404530_112030_Linux-x86-64_6of7.zip -d $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION #unzip -q $ORCALE_INSTALLER_LOCATION/p10404530_112030_Linux-x86-64_7of7.zip -d $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION check_error "FAILED TO EXTRACT ORACLE INSTALLER.";
#CHANGING THE OWNERSHIP OF EXTRACT LOCATION chown -R $oracle_user $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION
#CHANGING TO THE SSHSETUP LOCATION cd $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION/grid/sshsetup
#CREATING EXPECT FILE FOR SSH SETUP BETWEEN THE NODES echo 'expect "*password:"' >> PASS.txt echo 'send "'$oracle_user_password'\r"' >> PASS.txt HOST=`hostname` echo 'spawn ./sshUserSetup.sh -user '$oracle_user' -hosts "'$HOST'' >> TEMP.txt count=${#remote_hostname[@]} count=`expr $count + 1` y=2 count=$(($count * $y)) #count=`awk 'BEGIN{print 2^'$count'}'` index=0 while [ "$index" -lt "$count" ]; do HOST_NAME="${remote_hostname[$index]}" awk '/host/ { $0=$0 " " "'$HOST_NAME'" } {print}' TEMP.txt > FIRSTLINE.txt cat FIRSTLINE.txt > TEMP.txt head PASS.txt >> COMP.txt # head PASS.txt >> COMP.txt let "index++" done head PASS.txt >> COMP.txt echo "#!/usr/bin/expect" >> ssh.exp sed -e 's/$/"/' -i TEMP.txt awk '/host/ { $0=$0 " -noPromptPassphrase -confirm -advanced -exverify" } {print}' TEMP.txt > FIRSTLINE.txt cat FIRSTLINE.txt >> ssh.exp cat COMP.txt >> ssh.exp echo "expect eof" >> ssh.exp rm -rf TEMP.txt PASS.txt COMP.txt FIRSTLINE.txt
#CHAGING PERMISSION OF THE EXPECT FILE chmod 777 ssh.exp
#EXECUTING EXPECT FILE AS ORACLE USER su $oracle_user -c "./ssh.exp"

ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
########################################################### # SCRIPT TO INSTALL GRID INFRASTRUCTURE # EXECUTE orainstRoot.sh, root.sh AND configToolAllCommands ###########################################################
#ENVIRONMENTAL VARIABLES #export http_proxy=http://proxy.vmware.com:3128 export PATH=/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/games:/opt/vmware/bin:/opt/vmware/bin export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin/:/usr/sbin/:/sbin export ORACLE_HOME=$GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION/grid export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$GRID_HOME/lib PATH=$PATH:$$GRID_HOME/bin CLASSPATH=$$GRID_HOME/JRE CLASSPATH=${CLASSPATH}:$$GRID_HOME/jlib CLASSPATH=${CLASSPATH}:$$GRID_HOME/rdbms/jlib CLASSPATH=${CLASSPATH}:$$GRID_HOME/network/jlib export CLASSPATH
#PARAMTERS FROM APP DIRECTOR GRID_HOME="$grid_home" GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION="$grid_inventory_location" GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION="$grid_installer_extract_location"
#FUNCTION TO DISPLAY ERROR AND EXIT function check_error() { if [ ! "$?" = "0" ]; then error_exit "$1"; fi }
function error_exit() { echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2 exit 1 }
echo "Paramter Validation"
if [ "x${GRID_HOME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_HOME not set." fi
if [ "x${GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION not set." fi
if [ "x${GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION not set." fi
#CHANGING TO THE GRID INSTALLER LOCATION cd $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION/grid
#EXECUTING THE GRID INSTALLER su $oracle_user -c "./runInstaller -silent -responseFile $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION/grid/response/grid_install.rsp -ignorePrereq -waitforcompletion -ignoreSysPrereqs"
#LOGIC TO GET START IP FORMAT i.e. 10.20.30.0 OR 192.168.111.0 int_ip=`/sbin/ifconfig eth0 | grep 'inet addr:' | cut -d: -f2 | awk '{ print $1}'` end_ip=0 ip_count=12 while [ "$end_ip" != "." ] do end_ip=`echo ${int_ip:ip_count}` start_ip=`echo ${int_ip:0:ip_count}` ip_count=`expr $ip_count - 1` int_ip=$start_ip done
#ADDING ENTRIES RELATED TO NETWORK IN crsconfig_params FILE sed -i '16c'NETWORKS="eth0"/$start_ip.0:public,"eth0:1"/192.0.0.0:cluster_interconnect'"' $GRID_HOME/crs/install/crsconfig_params
#AFTER INSTALLATION OF GRID, NEED TO EXECUTE TWO FILES (orainstRoot.sh, root.sh) AS ROOT USER AND ONE (configToolAllCommands) AS ORACLE USER echo "EXECUTING orainstRoot.sh" $GRID_INVENTORY_LOCATION/orainstRoot.sh
echo "EXECUTING root.sh" $GRID_HOME/root.sh
LOOP_ITERATION=120 for (( i = 0 ; i < $LOOP_ITERATION ; i++ )) do grep -q "Configure Oracle Grid Infrastructure for a Cluster ... succeeded" $GRID_HOME/install/*.log if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo "ROOT.SH EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY" break else if [ $i -eq 119 ]; then echo "ROOT.SH EXECUTION FAILED" break fi sleep 30 fi done
su $oracle_user -c "$GRID_HOME/cfgtoollogs/configToolAllCommands RESPONSE_FILE=$GRID_HOME/crs/install/crsconfig_params"
echo "COMPLETED THE SCRIPT EXECUTION OF RAC"

vFabric tc Server Standard Edition service vFabric tc Server, the best place to build and run Java Spring applications, provides enterprise users with the lightweight server they want paired with the operational management, advanced diagnostics, and mission-critical support capabilities businesses need. Designed to be a drop-in replacement for Apache Tomcat, vFabric tc Server ensures a seamless migration path for existing custom-built and commercial software applications already certified for Tomcat.
To monitor tc Server with Hyperic, please use a vFabric Hyperic with tc Server plugin.

#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
set -e
#To support ubuntu java bins export PATH=$PATH:/usr/java/default/bin
if [ -f /usr/java/default/bin/java ]; then export JAVA_HOME=/usr/java/default else export JAVA_HOME=/usr fi
if [ "$automatically_start" == "YES" ]; then # Start instance if one exists if [ -d $install_path/working/springsource-tc-server-standard/$instance_name/bin ]; then cd $install_path/working/springsource-tc-server-standard/$instance_name/bin ./tcruntime-ctl.sh start fi else echo "Skipping startup" fi

ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/sh # Import global conf . $global_conf
set -e export http_proxy=http://proxy.vmware.com:3128
#To support ubuntu java bins export PATH=$PATH:/usr/java/default/bin
if [ -d $install_path/working/springsource-tc-server-standard ]; then echo "tc Server already installed. Skipping installation." else echo "Starting tc Server installation." mkdir -p $install_path/packages mv $tcserver_package $install_path/packages/springsource-tc-server-standard-2-RELEASE.tar.gz mv $installer $install_path/installer
chmod 755 $install_path/installer
if [ -f /usr/java/default/bin/java ]; then export JAVA_HOME=/usr/java/default else export JAVA_HOME=/usr fi
cd $install_path ./installer --setup-tcserver
#remove default "instance1" cd $install_path/working/springsource-tc-server-standard/instance1/bin/ ./tcruntime-ctl.sh stop rm -rf $install_path/working/springsource-tc-server-standard/instance1
# Create new instance cd $install_path/working/springsource-tc-server-standard
if [ "$use_ajp" = "YES" ]; then ./tcruntime-instance.sh create $instance_name -v 6.0.29.B.RELEASE --template bio --template ajp else ./tcruntime-instance.sh create $instance_name -v 6.0.29.B.RELEASE fi fi

#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
set -e
#To support ubuntu java bins export PATH=$PATH:/usr/java/default/bin
if [ -f /usr/java/default/bin/java ]; then export JAVA_HOME=/usr/java/default else export JAVA_HOME=/usr fi
# Set read-only properties export instance_dir="$install_path/working/springsource-tc-server-standard/$instance_name" export webapps_dir="$instance_dir/webapps" export service_start="$instance_dir/bin/tcruntime-ctl.sh start" export service_stop="$instance_dir/bin/tcruntime-ctl.sh stop" export service_restart="$instance_dir/bin/tcruntime-ctl.sh restart"
# Add the jvmRoute attr to the Engine if [ -f $instance_dir/conf/server.xml ]; then sed -ie "s/\(Engine defaultHost=\"localhost\"\)$/\1 jvmRoute=\"${JVM_ROUTE}\"/" ${instance_dir}/conf/server.xml fi

#!/bin/bash
######################################################### # SCRIPT TO INSTALL THE PRE-REQUISITE PACKAGES FOR RAC # ADDING VIPs AND IPs OF REMOTE HOSTS IN /etc/hosts # SETTING UP NFS #########################################################
#ENVIRONMENTAL VARIABLES #IMPORT GLOBAL CONFIG . $global_conf #export http_proxy=http://proxy.vmware.com:3128 export PATH=/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/games:/opt/vmware/bin:/opt/vmware/bin export HOME=/root export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin/:/usr/sbin/:/sbin
#PARAMTERS FROM APP DIRECTOR YUM_REPO_URL="$yum_repo_url" ORACLE_USER="$oracle_user" ORACLE_USER_PASSWORD="$oracle_user_password" SHARED_STORAGE_LOCATION="$shared_storage_location " STORAGE_LOCATION="$storage_location" REMOTE_HOST_IP="$remote_host_ip" REMOTE_HOSTNAME="$remote_hostname"
## Function To Display Error and Exit function check_error() { if [ ! "$?" = "0" ]; then error_exit "$1"; fi }
function error_exit() { echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2 exit 1 }
function valid_ip() { local ip=$1 local stat=1 if [[ $ip =~ ^[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}$ ]]; then OIFS=$IFS IFS='.' ip=($ip) IFS=$OIFS [[ ${ip[0]} -le 255 && ${ip[1]} -le 255\ && ${ip[2]} -le 255 && ${ip[3]} -le 255 ]] stat=$? fi return $stat }
echo "Paramter Validation"
#if [ "x${YUM_REPO_URL}" = "x" ]; then # error_exit "YUM_REPO_URL not set." #fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_USER}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_USER not set." fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_USER_PASSWORD}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_USER_PASSWORD not set." fi
if [ "x${SHARED_STORAGE_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "SHARED_STORAGE_LOCATION not set." fi
if [ "x${STORAGE_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "STORAGE_LOCATION not set." fi
if valid_ip $rac_scan_ip; then stat='good' else echo "BAD IP FORMAT USED FOR SCAN" exit fi
count=${#rac_vip_ip[@]} index=0 while [ "$index" -lt "$count" ]; do ip="${rac_vip_ip[$index]}" if valid_ip $ip; then stat="good" else echo "BAD IP FORMAT USED FOR VIP" exit fi let "index++" done
# TO SET IPTABLES OFF /etc/init.d/iptables save /etc/init.d/iptables stop
#ORACLE INSTALLER WILL TEST FOR A SWAP SIZE OF 150M, THIS GARUNTEES WE HAVE IT dd if=/dev/zero of=/tmp/swapfile bs=1024 count=150000 mkswap /tmp/swapfile swapon /tmp/swapfile
#SETUP USERS ANDS GROUPS echo "Adding Oracle User" /usr/sbin/groupadd oinstall /usr/sbin/groupadd dba /usr/sbin/useradd -m -d /home/$ORACLE_USER -g oinstall -p $ORACLE_USER -G dba $ORACLE_USER chown -R oracle /home/$ORACLE_USER
echo "ADDING ORACLE USER -- DONE"
#ADDING ORACLE REPOSITORY #sed -i '3cbaseurl='$YUM_REPO_URL'' /etc/yum.repos.d/rhel-source.repo
#INSTALLING REQUIRED PACKAGES yum --nogpgcheck --noplugins -y install binutils smartmontools expect kernel oracleasm-support compat-libstdc++-33 libcap compat-libcap1 compat-libstdc++ elfutils-libelf elfutils-libelf-devel gcc gcc-c++ glibc glibc glibc-common glibc-devel glibc-devel libaio libaio-devel libgcc libgcc libstdc++ lbXtst libstdc++ libstdc++-devel make numactl-devel sysstat nfs-utils pdksh unixODBC unixODBC-devel unzip control-center check_error "UNABLE TO INSTALL THE REQUIRED PACKAGES.";
DNS_NAME=`dnsdomainname`
#SETTING SCAN IP AND NAME IN /etc/hosts/ FILE sed -i '2i'$rac_scan_ip' raccluster-scan.'$DNS_NAME' raccluster-scan' /etc/hosts
#SETTING RAC VIP IP AND ITS NAME IN /etc/hosts/ FILE COUNT=${#rac_vip_ip[@]} INDEX=0 while [ "$INDEX" -lt "$COUNT" ]; do HOST_NAME="${remote_hostname[$INDEX]}" IP="${rac_vip_ip[$INDEX]}" raccount=`expr $INDEX + 1` sed -i '2i'$IP' racvip'$raccount'.'$DNS_NAME' racvip'$raccount'' /etc/hosts let "INDEX++" done
#ADDING REMOTE HOST IP AND HOST NAME IN etc/hosts FILE COUNT=${#remote_hostname[@]} INDEX=0 int_ip=192.0.0.10 while [ "$INDEX" -lt "$COUNT" ]; do HOST_NAME="${remote_hostname[$INDEX]}" IP="${remote_host_ip[$INDEX]}"
if [ "$INDEX" -lt "$COUNT" ]; then sed -i '2i'192.0.0.9' racpr0.'`dnsdomainname`' racpr0' /etc/hosts fi end_ip=`echo ${int_ip:8}` start_ip=`echo ${int_ip:0:8}` end_ip=`expr $end_ip + 1` racpr_ip=$start_ip$end_ip raccount=`expr $INDEX + 1` if [ "$end_ip" = "99" ]; then echo "TOO MANY NODES, EXITING PROGRAM" exit fi sed -i '2i'$racpr_ip' racpr'$raccount'.'`dnsdomainname`' racpr'$raccount'' /etc/hosts int_ip=$racpr_ip sed -i '2i'$IP' '$HOST_NAME'.'`dnsdomainname`' '$HOST_NAME'' /etc/hosts let "INDEX++" done
# MAKING CHAMGES TO THE SSHD_CONFIG FILE echo "RSAAuthentication yes" >> /etc/ssh/sshd_config echo "PubkeyAuthentication yes" >> /etc/ssh/sshd_config
#ADDING PASSWORD TO ORACLE USER cat <<EOF > passwd.exp #!/usr/bin/expect spawn passwd $ORACLE_USER expect "*password:" send "$ORACLE_USER_PASSWORD\r" expect "*password:" send "$ORACLE_USER_PASSWORD\r" expect eof EOF
chmod 777 passwd.exp ./passwd.exp
#RESTARTING SSH SERVICE /etc/init.d/sshd restart service sshd start chkconfig sshd on
/sbin/ifconfig eth0:1 192.0.0.10 netmask 255.255.255.0 broadcast 192.0.0.255
mkdir -p $SHARED_STORAGE_LOCATION $STORAGE_LOCATION check_error "FAILED TO CREATE STORAGE AND SHARED STORAGE FOLDER.";
#CHANGING OWNER ON FOLDERS $shared_storage_location $STORAGE_LOCATION chown -R $ORACLE_USER $SHARED_STORAGE_LOCATION $STORAGE_LOCATION
#ENABLING NFS CONFIGURATION chkconfig nfs on
#ADDING ENTRY OF THE SHARED LOCATION IN /etc/exports echo "$SHARED_STORAGE_LOCATION *(rw,sync,no_wdelay,insecure_locks,no_root_squash)" >> /etc/exports
#ADDING ENTRY OF THE SHARED LOCATION IN /etc/fstab WITH DETAILS echo "$self_ip:$SHARED_STORAGE_LOCATION $STORAGE_LOCATION nfs rw,bg,hard,nointr,tcp,vers=3,timeo=600,rsize=32768,wsize=32768,actimeo=0 0 0" >> /etc/fstab
##MOUNTING NFS DRIVE #STARTING rpcbind /sbin/service rpcbind start
#RESTART NFS SERVICE service nfs restart
#MOUNTING mount $STORAGE_LOCATION check_error "FAILED TO MOUNT STORAGE LOCATION.";

#!/bin/bash
###################################################### # SCRIPT TO INSTALL THE ORACLE DATABASE SOFTWARE ######################################################
GRID_HOME="$grid_home" GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION="$grid_installer_extract_location" ORACLE_BASE="$oracle_base" ORACLE_INVENTORY_LOCATION="$oracle_inventory_location" ORACLE_HOME="$oracle_home" ORACLE_USER="$oracle_user"
#FUNCTION TO DISPLAY ERROR AND EXIT function check_error() { if [ ! "$?" = "0" ]; then error_exit "$1"; fi }
function error_exit() { echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2 exit 1 }
echo "Paramter Validation" if [ "x${GRID_HOME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_HOME not set." fi
if [ "x${GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION not set." fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_BASE}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_BASE not set." fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_INVENTORY_LOCATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_INVENTORY_LOCATION not set." fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_HOME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_HOME not set." fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_USER}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_USER not set." fi
cd $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION/grid/sshsetup su $ORACLE_USER -c "./ssh.exp"
#CHANGING TO DATABASE INSTALLER LOCATION cd $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION/database
#CREATING ORACLE BASE DIRECTORY mkdir $ORACLE_BASE
#CHANGING THE OWNERSHIP OF ORACLE_BASE chown -R $ORACLE_USER:oinstall $ORACLE_BASE
#EXECUTING DATABASE INSTALLER su $ORACLE_USER -c "./runInstaller -silent -force -ignorePrereq -waitforcompletion -responseFile $GRID_INSTALLER_EXTRACT_LOCATION/database/response/db_install.rsp"
echo "DONE DB INSTALLATION"
#AFTER INSTALLATION OF DATABASE, NEED TO EXECUTE root.sh AS ROOT USER $ORACLE_HOME/root.sh check_error "UNABLE TO EXECUTE root.sh SUCCESSFULLY.";

#!/bin/bash
########################################### # SCRIPT TO MODIFY THE DBCA RESPONSE FILE # CREATE DATABASE ###########################################
#PARAMTERS FROM APP DIRECTOR ORACLE_HOME="$oracle_home" ORACLE_BASE="$oracle_base" ORACLE_USER_PASSWORD="$oracle_user_password" ORACLE_USER="$oracle_user" DB_NAME="$db_name" SERVER_POOL_NAME="$server_pool_name" REMOTE_HOSTNAME="$remote_hostname" HOME="$ORACLE_HOME" DATA_FILE_DESTINATION="$data_file_destination" RECOVERY_AREA_DESTINATION="$recovery_area_destination" SID="$sid" TOTAL_MEMORY="$total_memory" GRID_HOME="$grid_home" DB_TYPE="$db_type"
#FUNCTION TO DISPLAY ERROR AND EXIT function check_error() { if [ ! "$?" = "0" ]; then error_exit "$1"; fi }
function error_exit() { echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2 exit 1 }
echo "Paramter Validation"
if [ "x${ORACLE_HOME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_HOME not set." fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_BASE}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_BASE not set." fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_USER_PASSWORD}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_USER_PASSWORD not set." fi
if [ "x${ORACLE_USER}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "ORACLE_USER not set." fi
if [ "x${DB_NAME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "DB_NAME not set." fi
if [ "x${SERVER_POOL_NAME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "SERVER_POOL_NAME not set." fi
if [ "x${REMOTE_HOSTNAME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "REMOTE_HOSTNAME not set." fi
if [ "x${DATA_FILE_DESTINATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "DATA_FILE_DESTINATION not set." fi
if [ "x${RECOVERY_AREA_DESTINATION}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "RECOVERY_AREA_DESTINATION not set." fi
if [ "x${SID}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "SID not set." fi
if [ "x${TOTAL_MEMORY}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "TOTAL_MEMORY not set." fi
if [ "x${GRID_HOME}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "GRID_HOME not set." fi
#CHANGING TO THE LOCATION WHERE DBCA EXISTS cd $ORACLE_HOME/bin
#DBCA RESPONSE FILE LOCATION DBCA_FILE=$HOME/assistants/dbca/dbca.rsp
HOST=`hostname`
#PERFORMED CASE SENSITIYITY OPERATION (CHANGE TO LOWERCASE) HOST1=`echo $HOST | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]'` HOST2=`echo $REMOTE_HOSTNAME | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]'`
#CREATING LIST OF NODES count=${#remote_hostname[@]} index=0 while [ "$index" -lt "$count" ]; do r_host="${remote_hostname[$index]}" HOST2=`echo $r_host | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]'` let "index++" raccount=`expr $index + 1` c=$HOST2 touch clu.txt chmod 777 clu.txt if [ "$index" = "1" ]; then echo $c >> clu.txt else sed -e 's/$/'$c'/' -i clu.txt fi if [ "$index" != "$count" ]; then sed -e 's/$/,/' -i clu.txt fi done NODE=$HOST1,`cat clu.txt` rm -rf clu.txt count=`expr $count + 1`
#MODIFYING DBCA RESPONSE FILE sed -i '78cGDBNAME = '$DB_NAME'' $DBCA_FILE
if [ "$DB_TYPE" = "active-passive" ]; then #For RAC ONE NODE sed -i '88cRACONENODE = "true"' $DBCA_FILE sed -i '99cRACONENODESERVICENAME = raconeservice' $DBCA_FILE #sed -i '110cPOLICYMANAGED = "true"' $DBCA_FILE fi
sed -i '123cCREATESERVERPOOL = "true"' $DBCA_FILE sed -i '137cFORCE = "true"' $DBCA_FILE sed -i '150cSERVERPOOLNAME = '$SERVER_POOL_NAME'' $DBCA_FILE sed -i '160cCARDINALITY ='$count'' $DBCA_FILE sed -i '170cSID = '$SID'' $DBCA_FILE sed -i '180cNODELIST= '$NODE'' $DBCA_FILE sed -i '211cSYSPASSWORD = '$ORACLE_USER_PASSWORD'' $DBCA_FILE sed -i '231cEMCONFIGURATION = "LOCAL"' $DBCA_FILE sed -i '271cCENTRALAGENT = "/disk2/app/11.2.0/grid"' $DBCA_FILE sed -i '280cHOSTUSERNAME = "oracle"' $DBCA_FILE sed -i '289cHOSTUSERPASSWORD = "oracle"' $DBCA_FILE sed -i '252cSYSMANPASSWORD = '$ORACLE_USER_PASSWORD'' $DBCA_FILE sed -i '262cDBSNMPPASSWORD = '$ORACLE_USER_PASSWORD'' $DBCA_FILE sed -i '360cDATAFILEDESTINATION = '$DATA_FILE_DESTINATION'' $DBCA_FILE sed -i '370cRECOVERYAREADESTINATION = '$RECOVERY_AREA_DESTINATION'' $DBCA_FILE sed -i '221cSYSTEMPASSWORD = '$ORACLE_USER_PASSWORD'' $DBCA_FILE sed -i '241cDISABLESECURITYCONFIGURATION = "ALL"' $DBCA_FILE sed -i '380cSTORAGETYPE=FS' $DBCA_FILE sed -i '553cTOTALMEMORY = '$TOTAL_MEMORY'' $DBCA_FILE
echo "MODIFICATION DONE IN RESPONSE FILE for DBCA"
#ENVIRONMENTAL VARIABLES SETUP FOR THE export ORACLE_HOME=$GRID_HOME export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$ORACLE_HOME/lib PATH=$PATH:$ORACLE_HOME/bin CLASSPATH=$ORACLE_HOME/JRE CLASSPATH=${CLASSPATH}:$ORACLE_HOME/jlib CLASSPATH=${CLASSPATH}:$ORACLE_HOME/rdbms/jlib CLASSPATH=${CLASSPATH}:$ORACLE_HOME/network/jlib export CLASSPATH ORACLE_TERM=xterm; export ORACLE_TERM PATH=/usr/sbin:$PATH; export PATH PATH=$ORACLE_HOME/bin:$PATH; export PATH
#CREATING THE FOLDERS FOR DATABASE mkdir -p $DATA_FILE_DESTINATION mkdir -p $RECOVERY_AREA_DESTINATION check_error "FAILED TO CREATE DATA_FILE_DESTINATION AND RECOVERY_FILE_DESTINATION FOLDERS.";
#CHANGING THE OWENSHIP OF THE FOLDER chown -R $ORACLE_USER:oinstall $DATA_FILE_DESTINATION $RECOVERY_AREA_DESTINATION check_error "FAILED TO CHANGE OWNERSHIP OF DATA_FILE_DESTINATION AND RECOVERY_FILE_DESTINATION FOLDERS.";
#EXECUTING THE DBCA FILE TO CREATE THE DATABASE su $ORACLE_USER -c "./dbca -silent -responseFile $HOME/assistants/dbca/dbca.rsp -continueOnNonFatalErrors true" check_error "FAILED TO EXECUTE DBCA.";
#GETTING THE IP OF THE MACHINE INT_IP=`/sbin/ifconfig eth0 | grep 'inet addr:' | cut -d: -f2 | awk '{ print $1}'`
LOOP_ITERATION=120 for (( i = 0 ; i < $LOOP_ITERATION ; i++ )) do grep -q "System Identifier(SID) Prefix:racDBsidThe Database Control URL is" $ORACLE_BASE/cfgtoollogs/dbca/racDB/racDB.log if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo "DATABASE CREATED SUCCESSFULLY" #URL TO ACCESS THE MANAGEMANT CONSOLE OF ORACLE RAC echo "The Database Control URL is https://$INT_IP:1158/em" break else if [ $i -eq 119 ]; then echo "DATABASE NOT SUCCESSFULLY CREATED" break fi sleep 30 fi done
